85deed0a-8273-4cbf-9d5b-33a61537cf63.description: Earners of this badge will be able to demonstrate setting up a drill press, identify drill bits by size and type and the operation of a drill press with 90% accuracy.
85deed0a-8273-4cbf-9d5b-33a61537cf63.name: Drilling

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12170a and the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 90% accuracy.

f54f9ecc-38d3-4a4d-9c1e-dacd538dea5a.description: Earners of this badge will be able to identify the different parts of a lathe and explain their purpose and what they do with 100% accuracy.
f54f9ecc-38d3-4a4d-9c1e-dacd538dea5a.name: Lathe Part Identification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12130a AND the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 100% accuracy.

0ab8dfe5-ea71-40d6-8a31-7915eab6d2d6.description: Earners of this badge will be able to identify the different parts of a milling machine and explain their purpose and what they do with 100% accuracy.
0ab8dfe5-ea71-40d6-8a31-7915eab6d2d6.name: Mill Part Identification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12180a AND the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 100% accuracy.

18a6bede-07de-4852-9bf8-ee9466841e0f.description: Earners of this badge will demonstrate a precision layout according to blueprint specification including bolt circles, slots, angles and radii with 90% accuracy.
18a6bede-07de-4852-9bf8-ee9466841e0f.name: Precision Layout

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12110a and the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 90% accuracy.

932e2c0b-aa53-4ac1-967e-19812a66ac7d.description: Earners of this badge will be able to identify taps according to their thread pitch and perform taping operations manually and with a manual lathe and manual milling machine with 90% accuracy.
932e2c0b-aa53-4ac1-967e-19812a66ac7d.name: Tapping

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12180a AND the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 90% accuracy.

0f7a087b-2d4e-4b52-9249-b41dc2f99cfa.description: Earners of this badge will be able to demonstrate cutting Unified National Course (UNC) and Unified National Fine (UNF) Threads, single point threading, and measuring cut threads using the three wire method.
0f7a087b-2d4e-4b52-9249-b41dc2f99cfa.name: Threading Basics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12150a and the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 90% accuracy.

216e9f0e-f511-44dc-88a2-cc587ad12a5e.description: Earners of this badge will be able to accurately grind high speed steel cutting tools including but not limited to: single point threading tool, grooving tool, roughing tool and finishing tool.
216e9f0e-f511-44dc-88a2-cc587ad12a5e.name: Tool Grinding

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12120a AND the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 100% accuracy.

e42b88b5-f3f6-40ef-b974-5eddb0871a10.description: Earners of this badge will demonstrate turning a part to a given diameter (+/-0.003") and turning a part to length (+/-0.01").
e42b88b5-f3f6-40ef-b974-5eddb0871a10.name: Turning Basics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module12130a and the in-lab assessment with the instructor to the given tolerances.

9c6721aa-49bf-4031-8263-4dbb68b12bbf.description: Earners of this badge will be able to accurately and efficiently indicate a part that is secured in a 4 jaw chuck to +/-0.0003".
9c6721aa-49bf-4031-8263-4dbb68b12bbf.name: 4 Jaw Indicating

badge_template_activities.title: Complete MFG12160a AND the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 100% accuracy.

d8993ff9-c9f6-4c01-95c7-54360e183c51.description: Earners of this badge will demonstrate setting up a taper attachment and knurling tool and cutting a taper and knurls on a shaft with 90% accuracy.
d8993ff9-c9f6-4c01-95c7-54360e183c51.name: Knurling & Tapering

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12160a AND the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 90% accuracy.

44855acd-d09a-45a4-acbe-0ba1b9ad27bb.description: Earners of this badge will be able to tram the head of a milling machine to +/-0.0005".
44855acd-d09a-45a4-acbe-0ba1b9ad27bb.name: Milling Machine Head Tramming

badge_template_activities.title: Tram the head of a manual milling machine to +/- 0.0005" without the help of an instructor.

5dfbdcbf-2d6b-4913-a85a-35d2cccb5ebb.description: Earners of this badge will be able to set their machine to the correct amperage for the type and size of electrode they are using as well as the type and size of material to be welded on. Earners will also show 85% accuracy with the E6010/6011 and E7018 electrodes in the flat and horizontal position.
5dfbdcbf-2d6b-4913-a85a-35d2cccb5ebb.name: SMAW Welding Operator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete with 85% accuracy all practical assignments in WLD111, WLD111D or WLD111M.

f3177218-34bd-47f8-8889-45a09a010757.description: Earners of this badge will have earned the Measurement Tool Operator and Measurement Tool Specialist Badges as well as will be able to accurately measure to 1/32" with a tape measure or scale, 0.0001" with a dial indicator, and 0.0001" with a micrometer
f3177218-34bd-47f8-8889-45a09a010757.name: Measurement Tool Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the third module of MFG116 Metrology AND take Measurement Test #3.

08400cc1-6a5a-41de-951e-32004f57c44c.description: Earners of this badge will be able to accurately measure to 1/8" with a tape measure, 0.01" with a dial caliper, and 0.01" with a micrometer.
08400cc1-6a5a-41de-951e-32004f57c44c.name: Measurement Tool Operator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the first module of MFG116 Metrology AND take Measurement Test #1.

02b47eb8-83f5-4511-ba5b-b4bb37e09f69.description: Earners of this badge will have earned the Measurement Tool Operator Badge as well as be able to accurately measure to 1/16" with a tape measure or scale, 0.001" with a dial caliper, 0.001" with a dial indicator and 0.001" with a micrometer.
02b47eb8-83f5-4511-ba5b-b4bb37e09f69.name: Measurement Tool Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the second module of MFG116 Metrology AND take Measurement Test #2.

81e4e902-e7c3-4544-9c2d-bf00b12d5bd6.description: Earners of this badge will have earned the SMAW Welding Operator and SMAW Welding Specialist badges as well as be able to demonstrate 95% accuracy with the E6010/6011 and E7018 electrodes in the vertical and overhead position on an unlimited D1.1 qualification plate.
81e4e902-e7c3-4544-9c2d-bf00b12d5bd6.name: SMAW Welding Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete with 95% accuracy a vertical and overhead D1.1 qualification plate.

5b1469fa-113e-4449-9e13-b2a0f0450b59.description: Earners of this badge will have earned the SMAW Welding Operator badge as well as be able to demonstrate 85% accuracy with the E6010/6011 and E7018 electrodes in the vertical and overhead position.
5b1469fa-113e-4449-9e13-b2a0f0450b59.name: SMAW Welding Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete with 85% accuracy all practical assignments in WLD112.

6eac65c8-cbcb-4298-a651-fb117ed29523.description: Earners of the CAD Expert badge have earned the CAD Operator and CAD Specialist badges and are also able to create presentations and to do stress analysis in both AutoDesk Inventor and SolidWorks.
6eac65c8-cbcb-4298-a651-fb117ed29523.name: CAD Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the final presentation in MET112 and MET122.

3375320b-1037-4b50-adec-7af2630ac3dc.description: Earners of the CAD Operator badge are able to create basic 2D sketches, create a 3D model of that sketch and prepare output files in both AutoDesk Inventor and SolidWorks.
3375320b-1037-4b50-adec-7af2630ac3dc.name: CAD Operator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the first 3 Modules of MET111(AutoDesk Inventor) and MET121(SolidWorks)

de7bc03b-7888-4969-aa72-38df4309c5e4.description: Earners of the CAD Specialist badge have earned the CAD Operator badge and are also able to create basic create assemblies, create drawings and create presentations in both AutoDesk Inventor and SolidWorks.
de7bc03b-7888-4969-aa72-38df4309c5e4.name: CAD Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the first 3 Modules of MET112(AutoDesk Inventor) and MET122(SolidWorks)

0faeee4c-3d48-4065-89fd-df27a95b724c.description: Earners of this badge will be able to identify carbide tooling by its ISO nomenclature.
0faeee4c-3d48-4065-89fd-df27a95b724c.name: Carbide Tooling

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12210a AND the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 90% accuracy.

43e08d8e-0087-42dc-9783-d21f2a060971.description: Earners of this badge will be able to explain multiple types of cutting fluids and their uses.
43e08d8e-0087-42dc-9783-d21f2a060971.name: Cutting Fluid

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Module MFG12210a and the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 90% accuracy.

95061a53-0f25-41ce-b6de-c163c24ecdc0.description: Earners of this badge will be able to identify multiple fixturing and clamping set ups AND demonstrate the fabrication and set up of said fixtures and clamps.
95061a53-0f25-41ce-b6de-c163c24ecdc0.name: Fixturing and Clamping

badge_template_activities.title: Complete MFG123 and the in-lab assessment with instructor at 100% accuracy.

a861737d-4d14-4e21-94a5-c097c5808245.description: Earners of this badge will be able to safely operate, correctly identify and adjust the different parts and components of a horizontal band saw, choose and change blades according to material, and accurately cut parts to 1/16" tolerance.
a861737d-4d14-4e21-94a5-c097c5808245.name: Horizontal Band Saw

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the in-person training with the instructor AND score 95% on the written assessment.

086d576b-d228-48cb-a681-45a026483ac7.description: Earners of this badge will demonstrate the proper set up and use of an indexing head on a manual milling machine and explain the different indexing plates.
086d576b-d228-48cb-a681-45a026483ac7.name: Indexing Head

badge_template_activities.title: Set up and operate an indexing head to print specifications without the help of an instructor.

0552c56f-186b-4590-97f4-2db22844e331.description: Earners of this badge will be able to set up and safely operate an offset boring head.
0552c56f-186b-4590-97f4-2db22844e331.name: Offset Boring

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the offset boring portion of the Punch Housing in MFG122 to +/-0.003" accuracy.

2eca35d7-5eb9-4743-adb6-66184dfaa16f.description: Earners of this badge will demonstrate the set up and use of a rotary table on a manual milling machine.
2eca35d7-5eb9-4743-adb6-66184dfaa16f.name: Rotary Table

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Punch Housing in MFG122 to +/- 0.005".

9106fc5b-2d15-4a36-95e4-0352f89ed6ea.description: Earners of this badge will be able to set-up and operate a surface grinder AND surface grind a part to +/-0.0005".
9106fc5b-2d15-4a36-95e4-0352f89ed6ea.name: Surface Grinding

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the in-lab assessment with the instructor at 100% accuracy.

b31a8ae8-fe92-4573-aff6-9380f042f483.description: Earners of this badge will be able to safely operate, correctly identify and adjust the different parts and components of a vertical band saw, choose and change blades according to material, and accurately cut parts to 1/16" tolerance.
b31a8ae8-fe92-4573-aff6-9380f042f483.name: Vertical Band Saw

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the in-person training with the instructor AND score 95% on the written assessment.

402a2130-2538-4b8e-932c-d7fb26c1e6dc.description: Earners of this badge will be able to identify SMAW, GMAW, FCAW and GTAW electrodes, including size, tensile strength, welding position and flux/wire/tungsten composition.
402a2130-2538-4b8e-932c-d7fb26c1e6dc.name: Welding Electrode Identification

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in the electrode identification lecture, complete written assessment with 85% accuracy and complete a hands on lab with 85% accuracy.
